case_studies.title: AI-Enabled Bid Management & Opportunity Screening
case_studies.description: Challenge: Analysts sift 400 pages per RFP; missed clauses cause disqualifications; pricing trends hidden in archives. Solution: Crawler ingests tenders, maps past answers, and flags compliance gaps. Impact: Fewer redlines, faster approvals, and data-backed pricing confidence.

case_studies.title: Social-Media Public Opinion Radar
case_studies.description: AI captures real-time sentiment across major platforms and feeds interactive dashboards, driving engagement and ad revenue.

case_studies.title: User-Facing AI Copilot for Payroll
case_studies.description: Conversational assistant that answers payroll questions instantly, surfaces relevant records, and automates routine HR queries.

case_studies.title: ML-Powered Market Intelligence System
case_studies.description: Challenge: Broad TAM estimates and lack of patient-level linkage. Solution: Parsed national Rx data with LLMs to infer disease status. Impact: 10x tighter confidence bands, faster sizing cycles, and clearer insights.
solutions: Parsed national Rx data with LLMs

case_studies.title: Illegal-Stream Takedown System
case_studies.description: 24/7 virtual operator that mimics human browsing to find and remove illegal streams across web and social media, protecting broadcast rights, revenue, and compliance.
case_studies.image_file: Sports Broadcaster Owned by Fortune 500 Group.jpeg

case_studies.title: AI Assistant for Multiproduct Sales
case_studies.description: Challenge: No unified sales view and inconsistent personalization. Solution: Chatbot with tailored recommendations and adaptive messaging. Impact: Improved conversions, cross-sell penetration, and salesforce productivity.

case_studies.title: Customer Support Performance Analytics
case_studies.description: Omnichannel platform that centralizes agent interactions, tracks KPIs in real time, and surfaces behavioral patterns with AI/ML.

case_studies.title: Real-Time Dynamic Pricing Engine
case_studies.description: ML-driven engine that continuously analyzes internal and competitor data to set optimal prices within strategic guardrails.

case_studies.title: Process-Optimization AI Agent for Quadrante
case_studies.description: Real-time ML engine predicts parameters, what-if simulator previews shifts, optimizer auto-adjusts controls. Pb & Zn recoveries rise together, cleaner concentrates, faster stabilization.

case_studies.title: AI Roadmap Acceleration for a Leading Software Vendor
case_studies.description: AI Center of Excellence embedded within core teams to accelerate AI feature rollout, unify data architecture, and deploy reusable model pipelines — turning Sage's suite into a continuously learning, intelligence-driven platform.

case_studies.title: Clinical & Back-Office Operations Transformation
case_studies.description: Challenge: Fragmented scheduling and manual workflows reduced efficiency. Solution: AI automates scheduling, triage, and inventory planning. Impact: Improved patient throughput and experience, better staff utilization.

case_studies.title: Core Recruiting Operations Automation
case_studies.description: Automated sourcing, enrichment, and evaluation through a unified recruiting OS. Copilots scored calls, synced insights to CRM, and prioritized next actions — compressing cycle times and scaling recruiter leverage.

case_studies.deal_title: Farmácias Grupo STS | AutoML, Entidades adjudicantes
case_studies.title: Inventory & Working Capital Optimization System
case_studies.description: ML platform forecasts demand by store and SKU, automates replenishment, and optimizes supplier orders, reducing expirations, improving shelf availability, and releasing trapped working capital.

case_studies.title: Dynamic Pricing & Quote Orchestration Platform
case_studies.description: ML-driven quote engine benchmarks market rates, generates optimized pricing instantly, and syncs to CRM, cutting manual quoting effort, capturing margin opportunities, and strengthening client responsiveness.

case_studies.title: AI Multiproduct Sales Copilot
case_studies.description: Chatbot with RAG consolidates portfolio information and personalizes client-specific recommendations, driving conversions, upsell, and cross-sell.

case_studies.title: AI Prescription Copilot for the Portuguese NHS
case_studies.description: Challenge: Rising complexity in prescriptions, hard-to-detect drug interactions, and manual verification. Solution: AI prescribing support, automated incompatibility scans, and instant drug query assistance. Impact: Safer prescribing, reduced clinician burden, and more consistent workflows.

case_studies.title: In-App AI Customer Support Agent
case_studies.description: AI agent integrated into webapp with 1-click intents, multi-source RAG with semantic ranking, and automated inline feedback. +28pp in confirmed resolution, <3s initial response, CSAT >80%.

case_studies.title: Multiproduct AI Sales Agent
case_studies.description: Agent unifies product data and pricing into a single cockpit; corporate RAG generates recommendations and orchestrates pricing, credit, and KYC agents. +40% proposal speed, +25% close rate.

case_studies.description: Crawler ingests tenders, maps past answers, and flags compliance gaps. Fewer redlines, faster approvals, and data-backed pricing confidence.

case_studies.title: AI Agent for Pricing, Quotes, and Proposal Generation
case_studies.description: Agent manages requests and responses in real-time; compares rates and syncs with CRM. -90% response time, more agile and scalable logistics.

case_studies.description: AI solution capturing real-time sentiment across major social networks, translating it into interactive dashboards, amplifying engagement and ad revenue.

case_studies.title: AI/ML Assistant for Pharmacy Sales
case_studies.description: AI chatbot over unified data with ML forecasts that flag at-risk accounts, driving double-digit uplift in sell-in/sell-out and higher productivity.
